title: Chipotle's typefaces
content:
Can anyone identify Chipotle's typefaces?

1. the ["Burritos so Big..."](http://web.archive.org/web/20150304195008/http:/www.seedsofgrowth.com/files/images/FirefoxScreenSnapz001.jpg)typeface

2. and [mexican grill](http://web.archive.org/web/20150304195008/http:/you.tell.her.jp/images/Chipotle-Logo.jpg) typeface
author: Grant Elliott

comments.content:
The second one is Bank Gothic  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/bank-gothic/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150304195008/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/bank-gothic/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/bank-gothic/")
